faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheading: Find answers to common queries about our legal services and processes.

consultation.a: Yes, we provide an initial 30-minute consultation free of charge to understand your case and determine how we can assist you. This allows us to evaluate your situation and provide preliminary advice.

location.a: Our main office is located in the heart of Kathmandu at Durbar Marg, with easy access to courts and government offices. We also offer virtual consultations for clients outside the valley.

specialization.q: What areas of law do you specialize in?
specialization.a: Our firm handles a wide range of legal matters including civil litigation, corporate law, criminal defense, family law, labor disputes, and property matters. Each of our attorneys has specific areas of expertise.

fees.a: We offer flexible fee arrangements including hourly rates, fixed fees for specific services, and in some cases, contingency fees. During our initial consultation, we'll discuss the fee structure that best suits your case.

duration.q: How long will my case take?
duration.a: The duration depends on the complexity of your case and court schedules. Simple matters may resolve in weeks, while complex litigation can take months or longer. We'll provide a realistic timeline after reviewing your case.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide exceptional legal services that protect our clients' interests while upholding the highest standards of justice and ethics.

legacy.title: Our Legacy
paragraphs: For over 15 years, LegalNepal has been a trusted name in legal practice, representing individuals, families, and corporations with dedication and expertise.
Our firm has successfully handled more than 500 cases across diverse practice areas, earning the trust of clients both locally and internationally.
With a strong commitment to justice, integrity, and client satisfaction, we continue to set the benchmark for legal excellence in Nepal.
